name: cakescape-backend
description: Cakespace is a cake ordering web-application that allows users to advertise and sell their cakes. Rural towns would be able to sell their commodities to the rest of the globe as a result of this. The user can purchase a nearby cake through the Website.The goal of this project is to establish a gateway that allows users to update product information securely using the Website and to purchase things online.
author: Rhythm Saha
